verso diversi target aziendali batch vs real time disegno standard industrializzazione use cases risorsa inoltre possesso seguenti capacita capacita lavorare profili senior it oltre data engineers lavorare consoft consoft sistemi is an italian company active the ict market since with offices torino milano genova roma and tunis every day something new is the claim of the company which has grown over the years without losing the desire for innovation that is expressed daily the activities carried out for its customers and also participating research projects collaboration with universities institutions and innovation poles since its setting up the company has focused on values such as inclusion respect and enhancement of diversity and of people sharing of skills and knowledge today we are professionals committed to bringing added value to our customers who are medium and large companies operating product sectors for them we realize technological and methodological solutions through consultancy work training project implementation and service delivery on topics such as devops big data analytics machine learning artificial intelligence enterprise content management cyber security and telecommunication if you are passionate about innovation and computer technology if you like to work team and if you appreciate the seriousness and correctness interpersonal relationships you are rispetto valorizzazione diversita persone condivisione competenze conoscenze oggi professionisti dedicati portare valore aggiunto clienti medio grandi imprese operanti settori merceologici realizziamo soluzioni tecnologiche metodologiche attraverso attivita consulenza formazione realizzazione progetti erogazione servizi temi quali devops big dataanalytics machine learning artificial intelligence enterprise content management cyber security telecommunication grande passione linnovazione tecnologia informatica piace lavorare gruppo ami serieta correttezza rapporti interpersonali persona giusta lavorare consoft consoft sistemi is an italian company active the ict market since with offices torino milano genova roma and tunis every day something new is the claim of the company which has grown over the years without losing the desire for innovation that is expressed daily the activities carried out for its customers and also participating research projects collaboration with universities institutions and innovation poles since its setting up the company has focused on values such as inclusion respect and enhancement of diversity and of people sharing of skills and knowledge today we are professionals committed to bringing added value to our customers who are medium and large companies operating product sectors for them we realize technological and methodological solutions through consultancy work training project implementation and service delivery on topics such as devops big data analytics machine learning artificial intelligence enterprise content management cyber security and telecommunication if you are passionate about innovation and computer technology if you like to work team and if you appreciate the seriousness and correctness interpersonal relationships you are the right person to work consoft sviluppatore java liferay portal prestigioso cliente milano cercando programmatore java consolidata esperienza programmazione oggetti inserire team preparato dinamico lavorare consoft consoft sistemi is an italian company active the ict market since with offices torino milano genova roma and tunis every day something new is the claim of the company which has grown over the years without losing the desire for innovation that is expressed daily the activities carried out for its customers and also participating research projects collaboration with universities institutions and innovation poles since its setting up the company has focused on values such as inclusion respect and enhancement of diversity and of people sharing of skills and knowledge today we are professionals committed to bringing added value to our customers who are medium and large companies operating product sectors for them we realize technological and methodological solutions through consultancy work training project implementation and service delivery on topics such as devops big data analytics machine learning artificial intelligence enterprise content management cyber security and telecommunication if you are passionate about innovation and computer technology if you like to work team and if you appreciate the seriousness and correctness interpersonal relationships you are it consultant do you like it and you are passionate about finding the truth you are ambitious and looking for the opportunity of your life osm value srl company authorized by the national agency for active labor policies anpal with registration number of research by swiss fts is young and dynamic company that has successfully been growing from the beginning and has become leader it forensics and ediscovery switzerland we have offices switzerland zurich and singapore and other european countries will follow soon our client base spans from southeast asia through europe and the americas and includes international corporations financial institutions law firms consulting firms and governmental organizations swiss fts supports its clients white collar crime investigations cases of corruption embezzlement and misconduct we are currently looking for it consultant future manager we forensically collect process and analyze potentially relevant data and prepare it for review by lawyers and forensic investigators with team of sharp cooperative and creative minds who seek to find the optimal solution for our clients and partners the ideal candidates have outstanding analytical skills abstract and structured thinking capabilities organizational skills and are solution and goal oriented they are great team players and have excellent social and communicative skills the chosen candidates will work interdisciplinary teams of legal finance and it experts and will interact directly with the clients and will be responsible of the coordination between the stakeholders client it lawyers accountants project managers their objective will be to help find the facts and truth economic crime investigations by forensically handling electronically stored structured and unstructured data and combining it for analysis we will support them further developing their hard and soft skills and provide other career opportunities such as becoming team leaders directors and more we offer permanent contract with very good salary and additional compensation and benefits such as recurring training and education budgets performance based bonus and the opportunity to work for company that is dedicated to support its team to succeed we require technical bachelor an intermediate level sql and microsoft windows server practical experience programming languages such as and scripting languages as python and ruby or similar fluent english and proficient german or french flexibility regard of working time and availability to travel for business we would appreciate basic understanding of it infrastructure and network design if challenges energize you send your cv palermo

senior architect milan who are we looking for order to enhance our teams we are looking for senior architect with minimum years of experience this role within the finance sectors if you are able to demonstrate full autonomy and resource management with the ability to prepare estimates and organization of work tasks if your aim is to professionally grow up the it consulting field working an international and multicultural environment flexible client and team working oriented with the customer and at the customers location youtmll also work with colleagues from across gft group to help our clients deliver breakthrough products experiences and businesses you will be involved leading agile implementation and transformation projects with our clients we combine the latest open source technologies together with traditional enterprise software products principal duties and responsibilities  providing technical expertise by independently determining and developing approaches to solutions  developing new software engineering methods or processes existing processes  writing high level design specs unit test plans and or integration test plans  analyzing and coding complex modules defining data structures and specifing test tools  understanding and adhering to cost delivery quality targets established during the program design phase nature of the tasks  architecture and design of information systems  review of the architecture of existing systems  development of component architecture and building blocks  coordination of the implementation of the technical architecture  technical interface between the project leaders and the developers  production of software architecture documents  participation technical working groups progress meetings and meetings with the customer  assistance the testing the technical documentation the deployment the evaluation and the reporting what we require from you  bachelortms degree informatics or software engineering  fluent both spoken and written english  knowledge of service oriented architecture applications design modelling tools  good knowledge of object oriented programming languages enterprise architecture relational dbms  knowledge of interoperability technology web services message oriented middleware service oriented bus  experience service bus architecture relational databases web technologies architecture and design of information systems development of information systems uml or case tools  good redaction skills  ability to cope with fast changing technologies used application architecture and design about gft gft technologies gft is business change and technology consultancy trusted by the worldtms leading financial services institutions to solve their most critical challenges specifically defining answers to the current constant of regulatory change  whilst innovating to meet the demands of the digital revolution gft brings together advisory creative and technology capabilities with innovation culture and specialist knowledge of the finance sector to transform the clientstm businesses utilising the innovation platform gft is able to provide international technology pioneers and established companies access to global network which enables them to tap into the disruptive trends financial services markets and harness them for their out of the box thinking gft plans to generate consolidated revenue of around eur million its financial year founded the company is now represented twelve countries with global team of almost employees the gft share is listed on the frankfurt stock exchange the tecdax isin de0005800601 milano

prendera contatto responsabili acquisti it primarie aziende territorio finalita promuovere servizi aumentare quindi base portafoglio assegnato consulente incontrando clienti afferenti proprio portafoglio implementera attraverso servizi cloud sistemi comunicazione collaborazione interni allazienda permettendo cosi miglioramento vendita almeno tre anni mondo it telecomunicazionicapacita it technical manger primeur is looking for an energetic highly motivated individual to join our extremely talented and technical sales team who are instrumental to primeurs growth as technical sales you will act as trusted advisor to primeurtms prospective customers by proving how primeur solutions can bring their digital investments together allowing for faster digital transformation you will partner closely with sales account manager throughout the sales cycle to qualify sales opportunities with regards to customer technical requirements competition process and budgeting what we are looking for  enterprise software experience skillset to establish trust with clients and ability to influence key decision makers the sales cycle  ability to rapidly understand and translate clientstm business challenges and concerns into solution oriented discussion  persuasive communication skills for presenting to customer levels from ctos cios to engineering managers and programmers  support the commercial teams activities order that potential opportunities are identified and suitably qualified or  bridging between prospects needs and product team roadmap  product unique selling points definition functional benefits for the client  support case studies preparation  extract project kpis value messaging from client directors solution architect to support the lead generation activities  run tailored technical demonstrations presentations and pitch knowledgeably the entire offerings to prospective customers technical staff  experience building and delivering proofs of concept pocs and responding to functional technical elements of rfis rfps independently and effectively  hands on experience with middleware integration architecture patterns web services technologies data integration bpmn b2b esb apis soa  experience with cloud technologies ipaas saas applications cloud infrastructure etc is plus  excellent verbal communication written communication and presentation skills  ability to travel as needed and to work flexible hours throughout the sales territory  fluent spoken and written english to the resources that will become part fo our team we offer path of professional development with the possibility of growth and continuous training solid and higlhy professionalizing context what we offer permanent contract the treatment will be line with the actual and accrued competences benefits car pc mobile phone milano

progettazione sviluppo hardware software ricerca seleziona urgentemente sistemista microsoft windows trasfertista cliente realta attiva molto dinamica ben posizionata settore propria competenza sicuro rilievo desidera entrare contatto risorse giovani dinamiche etatm apprendistato max anni seriamente motivate decisamente appassionate sistemistica networking avanzato complesso requisito fondamentale dopo intenso periodo training formativo iniziale presso sede chiavari risorsa selezionata lavorera esclusivamente trasfertista probabilmente presso sedi distaccate brescia oppure lugano etm percio indispensabile possedere motivazione interesse specifici lavorare trasfertista risorsa ideale possesso percorso studi effettuato ambito informatico gia maturato capacita esperienze lavorative periodo complessivo inferiore anni campo sistemistica hardware particolare attenzione possesso specifiche abilita acquisite campo lavorativo iEUR gestione sistemi microsoft windows lato server lato client iEUR gestione apparati di networking switch firewall ecc poi considerato requisito preferenziale essenziale buona conoscenza acquisita ambito lavorativo materia gestione microsoft hyper gradito possesso automobile propria altri requisiti indispensabili residenza domicilio zona genova e o riviera levante conoscenza lingua inglese scritta parlata eta superiore anni disponibilita essere assunti contratto apprendistato mentalita aperta rapidamente adattabile improvvisi cambiamenti precisa ordinata rigida impostata unita spirito diniziativa capacita inserimento team giovane fortemente lavorare consoft consoft sistemi is an italian company active the ict market since with offices torino milano genova roma and tunis every day something new is the claim of the company which has grown over the years without losing the desire for innovation that is expressed daily the activities carried out for its customers and also participating research projects collaboration with universities institutions and innovation poles since its setting up the company has focused on values such as inclusion respect and enhancement of diversity and of people sharing of skills and knowledge today we are professionals committed to bringing added value to our customers who are medium and large companies operating product sectors for them we realize technological and methodological solutions through consultancy work training project implementation and service delivery on topics such as devops big data analytics machine learning artificial intelligence enterprise content management cyber security and telecommunication if you are passionate about innovation and computer technology if you like to work team and if you appreciate the seriousness and correctness interpersonal relationships you are soluzioni tecnologiche metodologiche attraverso attivita consulenza formazione realizzazione progetti erogazione servizi temi quali devops big dataanalytics machine learning artificial intelligence enterprise content management cyber security telecommunication grande passione linnovazione tecnologia informatica piace lavorare gruppo ami serieta correttezza rapporti interpersonali persona giusta lavorare consoft consoft sistemi is an italian company active the ict market since with offices torino milano genova roma and tunis every day something new is the claim of the company which has grown over the years without losing the desire for innovation that is expressed daily the activities carried out for its customers and also participating research projects collaboration with universities institutions and innovation poles since its setting up the company has focused on values such as inclusion respect and enhancement of diversity and of people sharing of skills and knowledge today we are professionals committed to bringing added value to our customers who are medium and large companies operating product sectors for them we realize technological and methodological solutions through consultancy work training project implementation and service delivery on topics such as devops big data analytics machine learning artificial intelligence enterprise content management cyber security and telecommunication if you are passionate about innovation and computer technology if you like to work team and if you appreciate the seriousness and correctness interpersonal relationships you are the right person to work consoft android developer cercando sviluppatore ambito mobile preparato motivato entri far parte team ami realizzare app dispositivi mobili smart glasses smart watch creativo innovativo mente nellanima te lsdk strumento esprimerti lasciare impronta persona giusta inviaci candidatura aspettiamo stesso entusiasmo gruppo consoft datore lavoro prevede pari opportunita linnovazione esprime quotidianamente attivita svolte clienti partecipazione progetti ricerca collaborazione universita enti poli innovazione lazienda fin nascita puntato valori inclusione rispetto valorizzazione diversita persone condivisione competenze conoscenze oggi professionisti dedicati portare valore aggiunto clienti medio grandi imprese operanti settori merceologici realizziamo soluzioni tecnologiche metodologiche attraverso attivita consulenza formazione realizzazione progetti erogazione servizi temi quali devops big dataanalytics machine learning artificial intelligence enterprise content management cyber security telecommunication grande passione linnovazione tecnologia informatica piace lavorare gruppo ami serieta correttezza rapporti interpersonali persona giusta lavorare consoft consoft sistemi is an italian company active the ict market since with offices torino milano genova roma and tunis every day something new is the claim of the company which has grown over the years without losing the desire for innovation that is expressed daily the activities carried out for its customers and also participating research projects collaboration with universities institutions and innovation poles since its setting up the company has focused on values such as inclusion respect and enhancement of diversity and of people sharing of skills and knowledge today we are professionals committed to bringing added value to our customers who are medium and large companies operating product sectors for them we realize technological and methodological solutions through consultancy work training project implementation and service delivery on topics such as devops big data analytics machine learning artificial intelligence enterprise content management cyber security and telecommunication if you are passionate about innovation and computer technology if you like to work team and if you appreciate the seriousness and correctness interpersonal relationships you are the right person to work consoft technical writer ambito collaborazione primario operatore telecomunicazioni via satellite ricerchiamo technical writer lingua inglese possa collaborare dipartimenti it lavorare consoft consoft sistemi is an italian company active the ict market since with offices torino milano genova roma and tunis every day something new is the claim of the company which has grown over the years without losing the desire for innovation that is expressed daily the activities carried out for its customers and also participating research projects collaboration with universities institutions and innovation poles since its setting up the company has focused on values such as inclusion respect and enhancement of diversity and of people sharing of skills and knowledge today we are professionals committed to bringing added value to our customers who are medium and large companies operating product sectors for them we realize technological and methodological solutions through consultancy work training project implementation and service delivery on topics such as devops big data analytics machine learning artificial intelligence enterprise content management cyber security and telecommunication if you are passionate about innovation and computer technology if you like to work team and if you appreciate the seriousness and correctness interpersonal relationships you are the right person to work consoft sistemista splunk candidato ideale buona conoscenza piattaforma splunk enterprise esperienza almeno anno installazione configurazione sviluppo soluzioni basate splunk assistente tecnico linux call center cosa cerchiamo assistente tecnico supporti operazioni quotidiane metadonors particolare sedi remote disponibilita fare trasferte giorni specifiche esigenze progetti particolare presso altre sedi cerchiamo persona capace tenere sotto controllo diversi canali contesti progetti buona attitudine coordinamento project management predisposta utilizzare piutm disparate moderne tecnologie soluzioni dovrai supportare team operativi raccolta fondi principalmente call center organizzazioni clienti lavoriamo unit operative prendendo carico risolvendo modo tempestivo problemi genereranno applicando richieste modifica qualificando richieste intervenendo software verificando funzionalita sistemi modifiche apportate tenendo fede scadenze cosa dovrai fare pratica rispondere immantinente modo completo gentile richieste supporto arrivo clienti ticket telefono chat qualificando segnalazione risolvendo possibile gestendo richiesta secondo livello supporto interno presso fornitori particolare riferimenti due software legati raccolta fondi scrivere molta documentazione tecnica manuali utente legati prodotti mantenere aggiornata documentazione processi faq legati singoli progetti software sviluppati documentare interventi effettuati gestire permessi autorizzazioni utenti utilizzare sapientemente tool utilizzati acquisendo capacita configurazioni utenze amministrative svolgere test controllo qualita collaudi persona giusta predisposta o imparare nuovi applicativi sai studiare formarti autodidatta conosci sai risolvere problematiche relative desktop windows contesto aziendale conosci sai risolvere problematiche relative desktop linux muovi agilmente linea comando aprendo file modificando configurazioni riavviando servizi lato server conosci basi networking sai gestire piccola rete locale router wireless distingui switch albero natale sopporti bene contatto utenti piace spiegare cose modo semplice didattico soprattutto paziente preciso a puntuale ordinato a gestione attivitatm ricordi scadenze rispetti impegni proattivo a nelltmassunzione responsabilita individuando autonomia problemi facendosene carico proponendo soluzioni impari diverti farlo facilmente ltmutilizzo nuovi strumenti autonomia senza formazione frontale abituato predisposto lavorare team remoti utilizzando sistemi comunicazione distanza usiamo slack principalmente familiaritatm mondo android mobile genere elementi visti piacere ltmassenza comporta esclusione selezione esperienze assistenza tecnica esperienza attivita call center contributi comunita opensource gnulinux esperienza asterisk esperienza docente cosa offriamo inquadramento contratto nazionale part time 5gg ore tempo determinato primo periodo alte possibilita trasformazione junior ict technician eldor corporation was established by pasquale forte president and ceo and is an international group leader the automotive business and partner of the main automotive manufacturers across the world with employees worldwide and turnover of euro320 million eldor has production facilities italy china turkey brazil usa and sales technical offices germany china usa japan and south korea thanks to its rd technical centers and its proprietary production technology eldor is leading company research development and production of ignition systems electronic control units and systems for hybrid and electric vehicles nowadays eldor is focusing on main macro trends of the automotive industry electrification of vehicle robotics smart materials clean energy defect free factory today more than 180m vehicles run with eldor products junior ict technician eldor corporation multinazionale italiana leader settore automotive ricerca junior ict technician proprio headquarters orsenigo posizione supporta operativamente lict systems supervisor riporta gestione operativa funzionamento manutenzione sistemi informativi comunicazione installati focus aree tecniche ricerca sviluppo installa configura parco informatico computer desktop computer portatili palmari server stampanti scanner proiettori relativi software garantisce lidentificazione registrazione puntuale tutta strumentazione aziendale hardware licenze software relativa assegnazione responsabili centri costo gestendone eventuali spostamenti effettua interventi manutenzione stabiliti proprio responsabile riferendo risultati proponendo eventuali miglioramenti fornisce assistenza utenti base priorita definite proprio responsabile installa dispositivi implementando standard configurazione definiti responsabile pianifica verifica corretta gestione restore applica aggiornamenti patches cambiamenti configurazione sistemi operativi applicazioni software requisiti diploma perito informatico java developer js eldor corporation was established by pasquale forte president and ceo and is an international group leader the automotive business and partner of the main automotive manufacturers across the world with employees worldwide and turnover of euro320 million eldor has production facilities italy china turkey brazil usa and sales technical offices germany china usa japan and south korea thanks to its rd technical centers and its proprietary production technology eldor is leading company research development and production of ignition systems electronic control units and systems for hybrid and electric vehicles nowadays eldor is focusing on main macro trends of the automotive industry electrification of vehicle robotics smart materials clean energy defect free factory today more than 180m vehicles run with eldor products java developer js eldor corporation multinazionale italiana leader settore automotive ricerca proprio headquarters orsenigo co un a java developer js inserire nellarea ict quality system diretto riporto sap application manager figura occupera programmazione ambiente javascript specifico ruolo prevede seguenti attivita sviluppo test rilascio programma sviluppo linguaggio javascript applicazioni dispositivi mobili attivazione portali intranet gestione applicazioni sviluppo siti internet extranet requisiti laurea informatica ingegneria informatica esperienza equivalente almeno anni esperienza ruolo analogo eccellente conoscenza javascript preferibile conoscenza sql java neptune sap sap fiori como

hardware and firmware consultant movia spa opera oltre decennio mercato italiano velocemente affermata nuova realta strutturata competitiva proponendosi fornitore dinamico flessibile grado offrire unampia articolata gamma servizi soluzioni ict dalloutsourcing facility management desktop management system network management movia spa oggi realta continua importante crescita espansione crede investe costantemente persone momento ricerca hardware firmware consultant seguenti competenze job description service provided networking group central engineering you will be part of global hardware diagnostics development team very dynamic group usually working fast paced environment you will closely interact with diagnostics team members and teams from around the world china india canada and italy as diagnostics engineer you will be exposed to technologies used core and edge routing cisco products your main focus will be to ensure high quality of our products by developing component and system level embedded software the diagnostics software is target to verify asic fpga board and system designs engineering as well as manufacturing we are looking for motivated individuals outgoing who enjoy challenging tasks excellent software background and strong understanding of hardware is required solid problem solving skills and ability to troubleshoot software and hardware issues are highly desirable we offer great opportunity to grow your technical skills set and gain visibility and recognition among others groups role and responsabilities design and develop component and system level diagnostics software firmware for system board fpga and asic design verification and validation engineering and manufacturing author diagnostic functional specification to provide guidelines for implementation to achieve the highest level of test coverage with fault isolation at the component level provide inputs to the hardware team for dft work closely with hw design sw development and manufacturing teams and promote team collaboration initiate informal reviews of ideas and technical objectives within and across functional teams develop and execute detailed test plans and automate software tools to validate diagnostics software requires test automation and programming experience requirements essential skills must msee cs combined or msce with years of related experience bsee cs combined or bsce with years of related experience excellent programming skills solid background hardware seeking candidates with good or embedded software skills experience familiarity with unix development environment strong problem solving and debugging skills ability to translate engineering and manufacturing customer requirements into design objectives and able to work effectively team environment good english written oral communication skills ability to design plan and schedule complex diagnostics project desirable skills os and kernel development experience relevant industry experience with routers switches experience with test equipments eg oscilloscope logic analyzer experience with assembly programming language experience team and project management offre contratto atempo determinato data prevista inizio immediata durata fino marzo possibilita ulteriore rinnovo posizioni aperte sede lavoro monza i le candidati e interessati e possono inviare dettagliato la candidato a verra contattato a effettuare selezioni accesso milano

devops system engineer zuru tech italy the italian engineering division of the multinational zuru company specialized the realization of innovative software the architectural and manufacturing field for his internal staff is looking for an devops system engineer the figure will be totally responsible for the implementation management and proper functioning of company networks and servers with regard to the level of operation of company information systems ensuring efficiency and quality he she will also actively collaborate with the team dedicated to the management of the companys services architecture supporting the development and operativity of internally developed softwares the first application of the bim type the second an internal factory process control software for real time production terms of managing the it infrastructure necessary to support software the dedicated cloud the searched figure has the following requirements degree computer engineering computer science experience general system administration and network administration eg server management firewall router switching wireless dhcp and dns of at least years experience managing virtualized environments experience troubleshooting security issues for example certificate management network firewall configuration encryption considerable experience with linux systems experience hardware installation and maintenance raid gpu network cards ssds processors coolers etc experience with identity management eg ldap saml oauth knowledge of source code control with git knowledge of docker kubernetes knowledge of scripting languages eg python javascript bash powershell excellent knowledge of english written and spoken tech skills nice to have advanced knowledge of network security eg ids knowledge of physical security systems eg rfid biometrics cameras door controllers gitlab management experience software companies the automation of software development workflow continuous integration automated tests experience cloud computing aws azure or google cloud platform workstation assembly experience piece by piece experience with arch linux experience the administration of window environments soft skills excellent troubleshooting and creative we offer level and contract period commensurate with the experience purpose of employment working center modena the research is addressed to both sexes legislative decree no and to people of ages and nationalities pursuant to legislative decrees and candidates interested and possession of the requirements are invited to send their curriculum vitae including the authorization to process personal data pursuant to legislative decree and art gdpr modena

sw embedded forza alten fonda competenza professionalita profili tecnici manageriali vengono selezionati cura fine mantenere costantemente alto livello qualitativo risorse umane alten italia societa unipersonale via gaetano crespi milano info alten java school program cosa tratta percorso formazione sviluppo durata mesi stage dedicato giovani talento vogliano gettare basi carriera allinterno alten sviluppatore java sviluppa programma segue approccio apprendimento prevede iniziale periodo formativo aula formazione on the job divisione it alten termine programma valutazione positiva corso firenze genova napoli padova roma torino bari puo candidarsi persone motivate apprendere linguaggio programmazione java periti informatici laureati informatica ingegneri informatici matematici dovrebbe avere conoscenza base sistemi operativi client server particolare sistemi operativi microsoft windows buona conoscenza software produttivita microsoft office incluso microsoft visio metodologie consulenza conoscenza soluzioni citrix virtualizzazione on premise cloud enterprise mobility management networking file sync share oltre generale autonomia redazione documentazione tecnica stage junior communication ux designer zuru tech italy italian division of the multinational zuru company headquarter of software specialized the realization of innovative software the architectural field research for the project dreamcatcher of the company new graduate communication design junior ux designer to be placed training internship dreamcatcher is bim software that uses the unreal engine video game engine with this project the company intends to make the design of houses and their direct manufacturing accessible to everyone through single architectural design software the searched figure has the following requirements degree communication design or web design digital graphic arts and multimedia and or similar achieved no more than months knowledge of the main graphics and design programs such as illustrator photoshop adobe xd or sketch knowledge of the principles and methods of realization of the ui ux design of applications ability to draw both traditional and digital formats attitude to interpretation study and design of concepts and elements of brand identity with good communication skills and cooperation with the team ability to learn new processes and tools quickly and effectively and problem solving skills good knowledge of english both written and spoken the figure will be formed to reach level of autonomy relation to creation of rapid models and prototypes mockups that illustrate the concepts of the user interface creating variety of 2d user interface ui assets assist the ui programmer the implementation of ui components to cooperate creatively and effectively with ui ux designer team members and with groups of internal programmers work closely with designers and software developers to fully implement changes to the various programs ensure that the aforementioned activities always comply with the technical specifications and are carried out within the established time limits only applications completed of personal or universitytms projects portfolio and detailed cv will be considered valid we offer paid internship contract including daily ticket restaurant assumption purpose working center modena the research is addressed to both sexes legislative decree no and to people of ages and nationalities pursuant to legislative decrees and candidates interested and possession of the requirements are invited to send their curriculum vitae including the authorization to process personal data pursuant to legislative decree and art gdpr modena
